name: Hydrogen
description: A colorless, odorless gas that is the lightest and most abundant element in the universe.

name: Helium
description: A colorless, odorless, tasteless, non-toxic, inert gas that heads the noble gas group in the periodic table.

name: Lithium
description: A soft, silvery-white metal that is the lightest metal and the least dense solid element.

name: Beryllium
description: A hard, gray metal that is relatively rare in the universe and is used in aerospace components.

name: Boron
description: A metalloid essential for plant growth and used in glass and ceramics.
